data.text: ――Uh huh...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>――Uh huh...

data.text: Trainer's race info is straightforward and simple, just like always.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Trainer's race info is straightforward and simple, just like always.

data.text:
(The Autumn Tenno Sho is a big race with a storied history. 
Rob Roy-chan would be my biggest opponent there...)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>(The Autumn Tenno Sho is a big race with a storied history. 
<story>Rob Roy-chan would be my biggest opponent there...)

data.text:
(I'm glad I got to run with her at the Takarazuka Kinen. 
She told me I was like one of her stories... 
And showed me just what I'll leave behind.)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>(I'm glad I got to run with her at the Takarazuka Kinen. 
<story>She told me I was like one of her stories... 
<story>And showed me just what I'll leave behind.)

data.text:
(I ran in the Queen Elizabeth II cup last year, too. 
The standout there is Air Groove-san.)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>(I ran in the Queen Elizabeth II cup last year, too. 
<story>The standout there is Air Groove-san.)

data.text:
(The race itself has some memories for me. 
But more than anything else, I want to live up to their 
expectations and compete against them again!)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>(The race itself has some memories for me. 
<story>But more than anything else, I want to live up to their 
<story>expectations and compete against them again!)

data.text:
(The Mile Championship would definitely be a challenge, 
but it'd be good to make such an interesting race my last. 
I would be going up against Kawakami-chan.)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>(The Mile Championship would definitely be a challenge, 
<story>but it'd be good to make such an interesting race my last. 
<story>I would be going up against Kawakami-chan.)

data.text:
(She taught me what it means to win or lose, and the 
burning feelings behind them. I'd love to go against 
that Japanese-style Princess again~)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>(She taught me what it means to win or lose, and the 
<story>burning feelings behind them. I'd love to go against 
<story>that Japanese-style Princess again~)

data.text:
(And finally, the Arima Kinen... 
I'm not too good at running long-distance races, but 
it's my chance to thank my fans for supporting me.)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>(And finally, the Arima Kinen... 
<story>I'm not too good at running long-distance races, but 
<story>it's my chance to thank my fans for supporting me.)

data.text:
(The competitors would be... First, Scarlet-chan. 
Last time we went against each other, I couldn't give 
it my all. I want to show her what I'm like in perfect form.)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>(The competitors would be... First, Scarlet-chan. 
<story>Last time we went against each other, I couldn't give 
<story>it my all. I want to show her what I'm like in perfect form.)

data.text: (And――)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>(And――)

data.text:
"Fine Motion's friend Air Shakur is going to participate"... 
...Don't just up and call us buddies like that.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>"Fine Motion's friend Air Shakur is going to participate"... 
<story>...Don't just up and call us buddies like that.

data.text: Shakur!?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Shakur!?

data.text:
...I see what's going on here. 
Look at you, picking your last race like you're having a cup 
of tea. You sure are taking things easy.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...I see what's going on here. 
<story>Look at you, picking your last race like you're having a cup 
<story>of tea. You sure are taking things easy.

data.text:
Well, I have to be careful making this choice. 
I need to face this final race with the conviction it deserves...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Well, I have to be careful making this choice. 
<story>I need to face this final race with the conviction it deserves...

data.text: Oh, wow, conviction... Ha.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: Oh, wow, conviction... Ha.

data.text:
Why are you laughing~? 
I'm trying to think about this seriously!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Why are you laughing~? 
<story>I'm trying to think about this seriously!

data.text: Man, you really just don't learn, do you.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Man, you really just don't learn, do you.

data.text:
You can't choose because you want to run with everyone, as 
perfectly as you can, right?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You can't choose because you want to run with everyone, as 
<story>perfectly as you can, right?

data.text:
Then go ahead and make it someone else's problem. 
You really think you're the only one with "conviction"?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Then go ahead and make it someone else's problem. 
<story>You really think you're the only one with "conviction"?

data.text:
You're right... 
I'm allowed to let my Trainer handle this.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>You're right... 
<story>I'm allowed to let my Trainer handle this.

data.text: If they heard you say that, they'd burst into tears.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>If they heard you say that, they'd burst into tears.

data.text:
No, I don't mean it like that... 
...Wait, hang on, Shakur!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>No, I don't mean it like that... 
<story>...Wait, hang on, Shakur!

data.text:
Hey! 
You have something you want to tell me, don't you?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Hey! 
<story>You have something you want to tell me, don't you?

data.text:
...I'm going to the Arima Kinen. 
I was planning to tell you that.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...I'm going to the Arima Kinen. 
<story>I was planning to tell you that.

data.text: I think I'd get some useful data if I ran with you, after all.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>I think I'd get some useful data if I ran with you, after all.

data.text:
You're special. Anyone could tell. 
And that's why... I want to beat you down.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You're special. Anyone could tell. 
<story>And that's why... I want to beat you down.

data.text:
But judging by what you were doing, challenging you wouldn't be 
fair to the rest of 'em. So I kept my mouth shut.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>But judging by what you were doing, challenging you wouldn't be 
<story>fair to the rest of 'em. So I kept my mouth shut.

data.text:
Caring about fairness... 
That's so unlike you!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Caring about fairness... 
<story>That's so unlike you!

data.text:
You really think you can say whatever the hell you want as long 
as you don't use dirty language?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You really think you can say whatever the hell you want as long 
<story>as you don't use dirty language?

data.text: I'm just kidding. I know you're a kind and noble soul.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: I'm just kidding. I know you're a kind and noble soul.

data.text:
I feel like there's something else you wanted to tell me. 
Though it could just be a feeling.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I feel like there's something else you wanted to tell me. 
<story>Though it could just be a feeling.

data.text:
This might be your last chance to say what you want to say. 
Are you not going to tell me, even now?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>This might be your last chance to say what you want to say. 
<story>Are you not going to tell me, even now?

data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>......gh.

data.text: ...Even if you don't compete, come to the Arima Kinen.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...Even if you don't compete, come to the Arima Kinen.

data.text:
This is where it ends for me, too. 
...I'll fight like my life depends on it.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>This is where it ends for me, too. 
<story>...I'll fight like my life depends on it.

data.text: ! Shakur, you...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: ! Shakur, you...

data.text:
Come. You need to come, Fine. 
...'cause I'm gonna chew up your resolve and spit it back out.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Come. You need to come, Fine. 
<story>...'cause I'm gonna chew up your resolve and spit it back out.

data.text: Shakur...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Shakur...

data.text:
...Everyone has different feelings, and different circumstances. 
I――
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>...Everyone has different feelings, and different circumstances. 
<story>I――

data.text:
Before training, Fine Motion asked me to "choose the next 
objective race".
data.processed:
<story>Before training, Fine Motion asked me to "choose the next 
<story>objective race".

data.text:
And here's my opinion. 
"I can't choose!"
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>And here's my opinion. 
<story>"I can't choose!"

data.text:
But I have to choose, so... 
I need your help.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>But I have to choose, so... 
<story>I need your help.

data.text:
I want to leave this decision to you. 
Is that okay?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I want to leave this decision to you. 
<story>Is that okay?

data.text: Fine Motion's final race will be...
data.processed: <story>Fine Motion's final race will be...

data.text: The objective race has changed to the Arima Kinen.
data.processed: <story>The objective race has changed to the Arima Kinen.

data.text:
Okay! 
Let's make this a finale to remember...!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Okay! 
<story>Let's make this a finale to remember...!
